data.text: Ngeyo wunikuni ntoto ayi ngeyo wuvasudi wawu ;
Ngeyo wumonisini batu baku zithangu ziozi zikambulu diana
Vayi kuidi bobo beti kukinzika ngeyo wutelimisi dalapo
Wutuvukisa ayi wutusadisa mu koko kuaku ku lubakala
Nzambi wuyoluka tona ku buangu kiandi kinlongo :
Minu phuidi Ngaladi, ayi minu phuidi Manase ;
Mowabi diawu dibola diodi ndieti yobidila ;
Nani wela kundata ku divula di ngolo e ?
Keti ngeyo, e Nzambi, ngeyo wutuloza e ?
